components.description: A triangular red flag on a post. Most commonly associated with golf, as shown in the flag in hole emoji. Can also be used to represent the term red flag, signaling a problem or issue.
components.title: Triangular Flag on Post

description: A triangular red flag on a post. Most commonly associated with golf, as shown in the flag in hole emoji. Can also be used to represent the term red flag, signaling a problem or issue.
title: Triangular Flag on Post

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Transport And Map Symbols -> Signage and other symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A triangular red flag on a post. Most commonly associated with golf, as shown in the flag in hole emoji. Triangular Flag was approved as par http://emojipedia.org/triangular-flag-on-post/
emoji_net_data.name: triangular flag

bn:00091875v: To hold up to public blame or reproach; to advertise opprobriously; to denounce by public proclamation.
Affix in a public place or for public notice
To affix in a public place or for public notice.

bn:00088912v: Change location; move, travel, or proceed, also metaphorically
To change (from one value to another).
To move or travel (from one location to another).
To change the location of an object.
To transfer a file from one location to another. After the file is transferred, there is only one copy of the file, in the new location.
To move an object one pixel at a time.

bn:00082507v: Warn or arouse to a sense of danger or call to a state of preparedness

bn:00090151v: Attach a tag or label to
To apply a marker to content or items (like photos or text) to identify certain types of information.

bn:00088256v: Communicate or signal with a flag

bn:13673194v: To place milestones along (a road, etc.).

bn:13673195v: To plan out a project as a series of major steps.

bn:00034960n: Emblem usually consisting of a rectangular piece of cloth of distinctive design
A flag is a piece of fabric with a distinctive design that is used as a symbol, as a signaling device, or as decoration.
A piece of cloth, often decorated with an emblem, used as a visual signal or symbol.
Piece of fabric with a distinctive design

bn:00054933n: A stone milepost (or by extension in other materials), one of a series of numbered markers placed along a road at regular intervals, typically at the side of the road or in a median.
One of a series of numbered markers placed along a road at regular intervals.
Stone post at side of a road to show distances
Numbered marker along a road or boundary
A milestone is one of a series of numbered markers placed along a road or boundary at intervals of one mile or occasionally, parts of a mile.
